title: Khloe Kardashian shares carefree snaps of her happy daughter True clapping her hands on pier
text:
She is a proud mother of one.

And Khloe Kardashian shared a heartwarming Instagram album on Tuesday of her one-year-old daughter True's outing to a pier.

The 35-year-old reality TV star wrote: 'My TuTu' over the photos, which showed her little pride and joy clapping her hands.

Proud mama: Khloe Kardashian shared a heartwarming Instagram album on Tuesday of her one-year-old daughter True's outing to a pier

Khloe shares her daughter with the Cleveland Cavalier dreamboat Tristan Thompson, whom she left in February owing to his infidelity.

The dashing love rat recently began posting - and then quickly deleting - complements in Khloe's Instagram comments.

Last month, he wrote: 'perfection' with a heart eyes emoji on one snap and: 'The sun is shining bright on a beautiful [diamond emoji]' on another.

Baby mine: The 35-year-old reality TV star wrote: 'My TuTu' over the photos, which showed her little pride and joy clapping her hands

Khloe left Tristan in February after he shared a kiss at a party with Jordyn Woods the weekend following Valentine's Day.

Jordyn, who had posed for Khloe's brand Good American early in her modeling career, was at that point the best friend of Khloe's half-sister Kylie Jenner.

Less than 48 hours before True was born last April, DailyMail.com broke news of Tristan's alleged indiscretion with New York City strip club bartender Lani Blair.

Family matters: Khloe shares her daughter with the Cleveland Cavalier dreamboat Tristan Thompson, whom she left in February owing to his infidelity

Khloe began running around with her Cleveland Cavalier hunk when his ex-girlfriend Jordan Craig was still pregnant with his son Prince, two.

Although Jordan claims she was still with Tristan when he took up with Khloe, Khloe has insisted she thought the NBA heartthrob was single at the time.

'I'm not someone who holds a grudge. If I do that, it's only going to affect me,' Khloe said of Tristan last month while calling into On Air With Ryan Seacrest.
